data.actual_result: The images shown will only update when you close and reopen the image selector
data.expected_result: The images shown in the Discord selector should update while your camera roll does
data.short_description: When you open the camera roll image selector and then take/save a new image to your camera roll, the new image will not display until you close and reopen the selector
data.steps_to_repro: - Tap the button to import from camera roll (middle button) - Take or save a new image to your camera roll
